application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details of screening along the southern edge of the larger terrace at fifth floor level shown on drawing No.DMWR/A1/PL3-00115 Rev.C, the southern edge of the balconies at first to fourth floor levels shown on drawing No.DMWR/A1/PL3-00301 Rev.A and the western edge of the terrace to the western townhouse at third floor level shown on drawing No.DMWR/A1/PL3-00113 Rev.B which shall be at least 1.7m high above finished floor level  pursuant to condition 36 of planning permission ref: 2016/03271/FUL granted 6th April 2017.
